If you want to delete a specific load balancer using the Virtual Private Cloud API, follow these steps:

First, make sure the load balancer's `provisioning_status` is not `delete_pending`, as you cannot delete it if it is. To check this status, use the list load balancers command:

```
$ aws elbv2 describe-load-balancers --region us-west-2 --load-balancer-arn arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-west-2:123456789012:loadbalancer/app/MyLoadBalancer/XXX/XXX
```

Replace `arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-west-2:123456789012:loadbalancer/app/MyLoadBalancer/XXX/XXX` with your load balancer's ARN.

If the load balancer's `provisioning_status` is not `delete_pending`, proceed with deleting it:

```
$ aws elbv2 delete-load-balancer --
description: This request deletes a load balancer. This operation cannot be reversed.
